textBox.richText: Enhancements • PayPal handler has been completely redesigned for increased performance and reliability. • External credit will now optionally use the magnetic card reader to reference the CC on the receipt. • 80mm receipts now have an option to print a signature page. This is controlled in the preferences. • 80mm receipts now print the payment details on the customer receipt. • seSales packaging is now using a zip file instead of a DMG. • Purchase Orders now add all items for the selected vendor and allow you to edit the cost. This allows for flexible costs from vendors. • Bulk Price change window now has a search field to filter the items to change. Corrections/Updates • Paypal’s handling of magnetic cards has been updated to display the customer name and month/year properly. • 80mm receipts will no longer waste paper by having a large bottom margin. • Purchase Orders now print properly. • Purchase Orders now calculate their initial completion percentage correctly. • Invoices will no longer post when a drawer is not open and the option to prevent it is selected. • An intermittent crash in the Vendor Management has been corrected. • Instant discounts will no longer allow discounts greater than the value of the item being discounted. • Inventory Audits will no longer be populated with archived items. This is a free update for all registered users. MSZ
